text: Tallassee is a city in the U.S. state of Alabama. It is in both Elmore County and Tallapoosa County. At the 2020 census, the population was 4,763. It is home to a major hydroelectric power plant at Thurlow Dam operated by Alabama Power Company. ==References== Category:Cities in Alabama Category:1835 establishments in the United States Category:1830s establishments in Alabama
title: Tallassee, Alabama
